title: The Witch's Mirror
description: When Emily's mother mysteriously disappears she goes to live with her Great Aunt Margaret. Strange phenomenon have surrounded Emily since birth. A dark power that she is struggling to control has begun to surface. When she finds a strange mirror in her great aunt's cellar Emily begins to realize that things aren't as they appear. It isn't long before she finds herself thrown into the middle of a six thousand year old war between witches.
author: J.P. Hyzer
